name: CavershamBaptisttalks
0:
”Alexa, open caversham baptist talks”
”Alexa, ask caversham baptist talks for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start caversham baptist talks”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: caversham baptist talks
des: Listen to the latest talks from your Caversham Baptist Church. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
